content.question: ​The function <math alttext="g"><semantics><mi>g</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is given by <math alttext="g open parentheses x close parentheses equals tan x"><semantics><mrow><mi>g</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mi>tan</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>. What are all solutions to <math alttext="g open parentheses x close parentheses equals 3"><semantics><mrow><mi>g</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> ?

choices.label: ​<math alttext="x equals arctan 3"><semantics><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>arctan</mi><mn>3</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> and <math alttext="x equals pi plus arctan 3"><semantics><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>π</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>arctan</mi><mn>3</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> only

​​<math alttext="x equals arctan 3"><semantics><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>arctan</mi><mn>3</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> and <math alttext="x equals pi plus arctan open parentheses 3 plus pi close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>π</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>arctan</mi><mfenced><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>π</mi></mrow></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> only

​​<math alttext="x equals 2 pi k plus arctan 3"><semantics><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi><mi>k</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>arctan</mi><mn>3</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> only, where <math alttext="k"><semantics><mi>k</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is any integer

​<math alttext="x equals pi k plus arctan 3"><semantics><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>π</mi><mi>k</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>arctan</mi><mn>3</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, where <math alttext="k"><semantics><mi>k</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is any integer

content.answer: ​<math alttext="x equals pi k plus arctan 3"><semantics><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>π</mi><mi>k</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>arctan</mi><mn>3</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, where <math alttext="k"><semantics><mi>k</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is any integer

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Solve equations and inequalities represented analytically, with and without technology.
